sourcesContent:
Newest Stories

This component demonstrates fetching data from the HackerAPI.

Loading...

Title Link
{{ item.title }} Go to story
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public newestStories: Item[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { //http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { // this.forecasts = result; //}, error => console.error(error)); http.get(baseUrl + 'hackernews').subscribe(result => { console.log(result); this.newestStories = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } export interface Item { title: string; url: string; }
